title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
OB: When switching perspectives in the software, the maximized state of the view is lost. This means that if a user maximizes a view in one perspective and then switches to another perspective, the view is no longer maximized.
EB: The software should retain the maximized state of the view when switching perspectives. The view that was maximized in one perspective should stay maximized when switching to another perspective.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the software and switch to the first perspective.
2. Maximize any view in the first perspective.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Notice that the previously maximized view is not maximized anymore.
